ce792c17-f425-40e4-ac7f-60555547877f.description: Earners of the Tanium Certified Operator (TCO) certification are able to access and navigate the Tanium Console, ask questions to gather information about the environment, identify circumstances where Tanium can be leveraged to achieve desired change, and demonstrate primary use cases for each Tanium module. This entry-level certification validates core foundational knowledge and skills of basic Tanium Platform functionality.
ce792c17-f425-40e4-ac7f-60555547877f.name: Tanium Certified Operator

badge_template_activities.title: The Tanium Essentials course is an immersive training covering the primary operational use cases of the Tanium core platform and associated modules. Participants learn how to use Tanium’s powerful abilities to gain valuable network visibility, assess potential risks, plan for threat remediation, and empower security and IT operations teams to continuously secure, control, and manage every endpoint at speed and scale.
Tanium Certified Operator Exam

545ed00b-5fdc-4407-88ea-caedb61c7602.description: Earners of the elite TCO 500 were among the first 500 candidates to achieve the Tanium Certified Operator (TCO) certification, Tanium's first industry certification. They have demonstrated and validated their knowledge of the power of the Tanium platform and the ability to better manage and secure their environment.
545ed00b-5fdc-4407-88ea-caedb61c7602.name: Tanium Certified Operator 500

badge_template_activities.title: Tanium Certified Operator

78e6a66a-6de3-438c-af6c-5cb59b23ae3c.description: Earners of the Tanium Certified Administrator certification are able to operationalize, maintain and troubleshoot the Tanium platform. A Tanium Certified Administrator can manage permissions and computer groups, review, analyze, & troubleshoot Tanium platform issues, and import Tanium content. This next-level certification is for individuals interested in administering the Tanium platform with efficiency and expertise.
78e6a66a-6de3-438c-af6c-5cb59b23ae3c.name: Tanium Certified Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: The Tanium Administrator course is intended for professionals with at least six months experience using Tanium.  This comprehensive and hands-on course prepares Tanium administrators to strategically review, analyze and troubleshoot Tanium performance concerns using a variety of tools such as the System Status Page, /Info Page, Question and Action History, Tanium Health Check and basic TanOS administration.
Tanium Certified Administrator Exam

ad8b8ce4-af86-4228-8d17-023cfc853043.description: Earners of the Tanium Certified Specialist - Cloud Deployment (TCSCD) certification have validated their knowledge and skills around qualifying, planning, configuring and operationalizing deployments on Tanium Cloud.
ad8b8ce4-af86-4228-8d17-023cfc853043.name: Tanium Certified Specialist - Cloud Deployment

badge_template_activities.title: The Tanium Cloud Deployment course is highly recommended.
Tanium Certified Operator (TCO)

f17eb4fb-1869-47b4-aab9-87c3373cab62.description: Tanium’s Manager Accelerator Program is a highly engaging six-week live virtual program customized specifically to support Tanium managers to build, refine, and practice the skills they need to effectively lead their direct reports and teams in our rapidly growing company.
f17eb4fb-1869-47b4-aab9-87c3373cab62.name: Manager Accelerator Program

badge_template_activities.title: Pre and Post Skill Assessment by both Participant and Manager to assess growth in specific skill areas.

Weekly 90 minute immersive live online sessions, which include small and large group skill development, independent reflection, self-directed skill practice, role-plays, coaching, ongoing self-paced e-learning coursework, manager skill observation, customized individual development plan.

Weekly accountability check-ins with accountability partners to  practice, refine and document skills. Participation in an ongoing cohort of managers to share and document best practices. Regular check ins with participant managers to develop and gain feedback on the skills from the course.

8e2968ad-b18c-438f-b12f-c22909d87938.description: This qualification validates an individual's ability to effectively demonstrate expertise around providing an agile, customer-facing technical demonstration of Tanium's capabilities. The primary audience is Tanium Employees.
8e2968ad-b18c-438f-b12f-c22909d87938.name: Tanium Demo Qualified

badge_template_activities.title: In order to achieve this credential, an individual must complete a series of training courses, a written assessment and a practical live demonstration that is evaluated by senior leadership. Candidates are evaluated on content, technical acumen, presentation skills and ability to customize the demonstration real-time to ensure the relevance of how Tanium can be used to solve the business needs of the audience.

e1eeeb7e-9aee-4357-9a55-58e34f64fc90.description: Earners of the Tanium Certified Instructor (TCI) badge have demonstrated exceptional technical knowledge and possess the skills and experience required to be a Tanium instructor. TCIs are subject matter experts who excel at delivering the highest quality of instruction on the Tanium Platform and products. Tanium Certified Instructors are exclusively authorized to deliver Tanium training courses.
e1eeeb7e-9aee-4357-9a55-58e34f64fc90.name: Tanium Certified Instructor

badge_template_activities.title: Tanium Certified Operator

In order to achieve this badge, an individual must participate in a formal evaluation process designed to validate if an instructor candidate meets Tanium’s quality requirements for both technical instruction and presentation skills.

bf02f5e5-b2b4-4efc-81d4-364dbab7e737.description: Earners of the Tanium Partner Sales Champion badge are able to communicate the value of the Tanium platform to prospective customers and register qualified sales opportunities. They understand key challenges that organizations face in IT operations and security, effectively positioning Tanium as part of the solution. This includes launching Tanium Trial for test-driving products. This qualification validates the understanding of core Tanium sales concepts and utilization of key sales tools.
bf02f5e5-b2b4-4efc-81d4-364dbab7e737.name: Tanium Partner Sales Champion

badge_template_activities.title: The Tanium Partner Sales curriculum encompasses the Sales Advocate and Sales Champion web-based training courses, using micro-learning modules in a variety of formats. This self-paced learning path enables Tanium Partners to conduct engaging conversations, pitch the key Tanium solution(s), and drive towards successfully closing sales opportunities.
A knowledge assessment validates the participant's understanding of core Tanium sales concepts, solution value propositions, and positioning within the market.
The Partner Sales Champion qualification and associated learning path is available exclusively to members of the Tanium Partner Advantage Program.

e4c7aa72-b1ca-4f3c-ab3f-747caf243d79.description: The Tanium Risk Assessment (TRA) is a tool to evaluate the overall risk posture of an IT environment. The Risk Assessment assesses multiple risk vectors as well as additional cyber hygiene metrics and compensating controls as part of the overall assessment. Earners of this badge are able to successfully deliver the TRA: validate environment readiness, implement, configure and run the TRA processes, followed by evaluating and presenting the relevant data to the prospective customer.
e4c7aa72-b1ca-4f3c-ab3f-747caf243d79.name: Tanium Risk Assessment | Partner Champion

badge_template_activities.title: The Tanium Essentials course is an immersive training covering the primary operational use cases of the Tanium core platform and modules. Participants learn how to use Tanium’s powerful abilities to gain valuable network visibility, assess potential risks, plan for threat remediation, and empower security and IT operations teams to continuously secure, control, and manage every endpoint at speed and scale.

The comprehensive Tanium Risk Assessment (TRA) Bootcamp for partners, is an instructor-led training, providing participants with the critical skills to deliver successful TRAs. The sessions include detailed knowledge transfers, example scenarios, validation of skills through hands-on lab based work and runbook execution.
Professional experience participating in a successful partner-led delivery of the Tanium Risk Assessment to a prospective or existing customer.
The Tanium Risk Assessment | Partner Champion badge and associated enablement activities are available exclusively to members of the Tanium Partner Advantage Program.

e0357de8-a904-4690-817f-d0bf6f921064.description: The Tanium Partner Services Accreditation for Cloud Deployment entitles the holder to deploy the Tanium Cloud solution to end customers. Deployment includes but is not limited to the initial setup, configuration and initialization of the Tanium Cloud solution and modules after purchase. Additional tasks may include project management, pre-deployment preparation, administrative/permission setup and integration services. This accreditation does not include “on-premise” deployment activities.
e0357de8-a904-4690-817f-d0bf6f921064.name: Partner Services Accreditation: Cloud Deployment

badge_template_activities.title: Holders of the Tanium Partner Service Accreditation for Cloud Deployment must directly employ a minimum of two (2) individual holders of the Tanium Certified Operator (TCO) and Tanium Certified Specialist – Cloud Deployment (TCS-CD) certifications, and the certifications must be current (not expired).

An accredited partner organization’s two certified individuals (holders of the TCO and TCS-CD certifications) must each complete the full Operation and Cloud Deployment training curricula, including passing scores on all assigned course assessments.
This accreditation and associated enablement activities are available at Tanium's discretion, to Partners of Tanium.

f31cdd5b-f629-4fb2-adc3-bc10593e11bb.description: The Partner Services Accreditation for L1/L2 Support allows the holder to perform first (L1) and second (L2) level technical support of the Tanium platform, solutions & product modules for customers, replacing Tanium’s technical support. Technical support includes but is not limited to incident/issue investigation, troubleshooting, and remediation.
f31cdd5b-f629-4fb2-adc3-bc10593e11bb.name: Partner Services Accreditation: L1/L2 Support

badge_template_activities.title: Holders of the Tanium Partner Service Accreditation for L1/L2 Support must directly employ a minimum of two (2) individual holders of the Tanium Certified Operator (TCO) and Tanium Certified Administrator (TCA) certifications, and the certifications must be current (not expired).

An accredited partner organization’s two certified individuals (holders of the TCO and TCA certifications) must each complete the full Tanium Support Advocate and Tanium Support Champion training curricula, including passing scores on all assigned course assessments.
This accreditation and associated enablement activities are available at Tanium's discretion, to Partners of Tanium.
